post.description: Send a one-time password to the user email for registration or password reset verification
Create a new user account with email verification using OTP code
Authenticate user with email and password, returns access and refresh tokens
Invalidate refresh token and log out user from current device
Send password reset OTP code to user email
Reset user password using OTP code verification

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of playlists with optional filtering by owner, privacy, and tags

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: Filter by playlist owner user ID

post.description: Create a new playlist with name, description, and privacy settings

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific playlist including all tracks

put.description: Update playlist information including name, description, cover image, and privacy settings

delete.description: Delete a playlist and all its tracks

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of artists with optional filtering and search capabilities

post.description: Create a new artist profile with name, biography, and profile image

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific artist

delete.description: Delete an artist profile from the platform

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of songs with optional filtering by genre, artist, album, label, and language

post.description: Upload a new song with metadata including title, duration, artists, album, and genre

get.description: Retrieve currently trending songs based on play count and recent popularity
Retrieve detailed information about a specific song including artists, album, and genre

delete.description: Delete a song from the platform

put.description: Update the list of artists associated with a song and their roles

post.description: Track song play and increment the play counter for analytics

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of albums with optional filtering by label, search query, and sorting options
Retrieve detailed information about a specific album, optionally including all songs
Retrieve all albums from a specific record label

info.title: UIT-Music API
info.description: Music streaming platform API with features including user authentication, music playback, playlists, favorites, subscriptions, and recommendations.
